data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Silviu Petrescu signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to LA Galaxy's area.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Salt Lake's Corey Baird misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
In the minute 9, Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick LA Galaxy.
LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
In the minute 12, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
In the minute 14, Salt Lake needs to be cautious. LA Galaxy have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Sebastian Lletget of LA Galaxy gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 15, Silviu Petrescu awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu blows against Salt Lake's Damir Kreilach for offside.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 20, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Cristian Pavon (LA Galaxy) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
LA Galaxy have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 24, In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nick DePuy (LA Galaxy) has received a first yellow card.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 26, Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
Salt Lake's Albert Rusnak gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Salt Lake's Justen Glad goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 29, Silviu Petrescu awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
Salt Lake push forward at Rio Tinto Stadium and Corey Baird gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined LA Galaxy defence.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In the minute 33, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
In the minute 37, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 40, Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Salt Lake in Sandy.
Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 41, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 44, In Sandy, Albert Rusnak of Salt Lake is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Salt Lake.
At Rio Tinto Stadium the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Can Salt Lake capitalize from this throw-in deep inside LA Galaxy's half?
Salt Lake are pushing forward but Damir Kreilach's finish is wide of the goal.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Salt Lake's Justin Meram gets in a shot on goal at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a Salt Lake throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Salt Lake needs to be cautious. LA Galaxy have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Silviu Petrescu signals a Salt Lake throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 57, Efrain Alvarez is on a sub for Emil Cuello for LA Galaxy.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
In the minute 61, Emiliano Insua (LA Galaxy) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In Sandy LA Galaxy's Chicharito is caught offside.
In the minute 62, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
At Rio Tinto Stadium, Corey Baird has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Salt Lake have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 64, David Bingham is booked for the away team.
Albert Rusnak smashes in a penalty at Rio Tinto Stadium. The score is now 1-0.
LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon breaks free at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 66, Silviu Petrescu awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 68, Can Salt Lake capitalize from this throw-in deep inside LA Galaxy's half?
Silviu Petrescu signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to LA Galaxy's area.
Silviu Petrescu awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 70, Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
Goal! Damir Kreilach extends Salt Lake's lead to 2-0.
Albert Rusnak with an assist there.
In the minute 73, LA Galaxy make their second substitution with Joe Corona replacing Jonathan Dos Santos.
The home team have replaced Justin Meram with Maikel Chang. This is the second substitution made today by Freddy Juarez.
The home team replace Corey Baird with Douglas Martinez.
In the minute 76, Salt Lake have a dangerous throw-in.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Goal kick for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 79, Salt Lake are coming forward and Douglas Martinez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 80, In Sandy LA Galaxy attack through Sebastian Lletget. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 80, Guillermo Schelotto (LA Galaxy) is making a third substitution, with Ethan Zubak replacing Chicharito.
Cameron Dunbar is replacing Sebastian Lletget for LA Galaxy at Rio Tinto Stadium.
LA Galaxy are caught offside.
In the minute 83, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
At Rio Tinto Stadium, LA Galaxy are penalized for being offside.
LA Galaxy push upfield but Silviu Petrescu quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 86, Silviu Petrescu awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 89, Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Salt Lake advance rapidly upfield but Silviu Petrescu blows for offside.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Douglas Martinez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Salt Lake.
Ethan Zubak of LA Galaxy smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in the half of LA Galaxy.
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
